title: (x) Swedish mobile communication company - Verona {Eduardo}
content:
I'm interested to know more about this typeface. I have looked around for it for weeks but no catch.   
I find it quite refreshing and its quite brave face for a company.   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110135534im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/22587.gif)   
   
More samples are found here [www.tre.se](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110135534/http:/www.tre.se/)   
   
/Fredde
author: fredde

comments.content: Perfect!. I really like the mood of that typeface, and it really reflects the company as well. And what I didn't expect to find was to get an inside peek the development process of the font!. So now I know what to read tonight :-)
